text: Sir Arthur Eric Courtney Drake (29 November 1910 – 31 October 1996), was a British businessman, chairman of BP from 1969 to 1975. Drake was born in Rochester, Kent, the son of a doctor, and educated at Pembroke College, Cambridge, where he received a bachelor's degree in law. In 1975, he was by succeeded Sir David Steel as chairman of BP. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1996 deaths Category:British businesspeople in the oil industry Category:British chairmen of corporations Category:Businesspeople awarded knighthoods Category:Chairmen of BP Category:Knights Bachelor Category:Alumni of Pembroke College, Cambridge Category:People from Rochester, Kent
